description: Episode number 4 of Series "Drugs: the children are choosing". The fourth film in the series suggests reasons why teenagers may begin to experiment with drugs. Using simulated everyday situations shows how children learn from example that drugs can bring pleasure and relief. Finally an expert outlines a program which presents real alternatives.
